meaning: able to express thoughts and ideas clearly and effectively
fluent and persuasive in speech or writing
feeling certain about your abilities and not afraid to express yourself
good at convincing others to agree with your point of view
to express an idea or feeling clearly in words
interesting and able to hold someone's attention
genuine and real, not fake or artificial
having a compelling charm that inspires devotion in others
having the power to change or affect someone or something
very interesting and exciting, making you want to pay attention
